thread.title: BRIEF-Dana Gets Contract To Supply Axles For Jaguar, Land Rover Programs

title: BRIEF-Dana Gets Contract To Supply Axles For Jaguar, Land Rover Programs
text: March 22, 2018 / 6:13 PM / Updated 32 minutes ago BRIEF-Dana Gets Contract To Supply Axles For Jaguar, Land Rover Programs Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Dana Inc: * DANA SECURES CONTRACT TO SUPPLY AXLES FOR NEXT-GENERATION JAGUAR, LAND ROVER PROGRAMS * SAYS ESTIMATED VALUE FOR THESE PROGRAMS TOTAL MORE THAN £300 MILLION​ * SAYS TOTAL INVESTMENT FOR JAGUAR LAND ROVER PROGRAMS IS EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT £21 MILLION * SAYS NEW CONTRACTS TO SUPPLY FRONT AND REAR AXLES FOR NEXT GENERATION OF JAGUAR, LAND ROVER LUXURY VEHICLES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
